expected.locator: span:contains("Last Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!")
expected.helpBlock: Last Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!

expected.locator: span:contains("Email Address does not appear to be valid!")
expected.helpBlock: Email Address does not appear to be valid!

expected.locator: span:contains("Address 1 must be between 3 and 128 characters!")
expected.helpBlock: Address 1 must be between 3 and 128 characters!

expected.locator: span:contains("City must be between 3 and 128 characters!")
expected.helpBlock: City must be between 3 and 128 characters!

expected.locator: span:contains("Zip/postal code must be between 3 and 10 characters!")

expected.helpBlock: Login name must be alphanumeric only and between 5 and 64 characters!

expected.locator: span:contains("Password confirmation does not match password!")
